home.title: Make your brand unforgettable with our AR Solutions
home.subHeading: Arexa specialises in creating jaw-dropping Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and CGI experiences tailored for Brands, Companies, Campaigns, and Influencers.

services.heading: Elevate your Brand with our Innovative Extended Reality Solutions

servicesList.title: AR Filters
servicesList.desc: Make your social media pop with our Social AR services! We create fun, interactive filters and effects that get people talking about your brand.

servicesList.title: XR Applications
servicesList.desc: Build custom AR & VR apps! We design, develop, and deploy apps that solve real-world problems and amaze users.

servicesList.title: AR Swags
servicesList.desc: Turn your ordinary swags or gifts into AR enabled Swags. Be it a small sticker or an ID Card or a T-shirt, we can add magic to it using AR.

servicesList.title: AR for Websites
servicesList.desc: Bring your website to life with our Web AR services! We design interactive experiences that play right in your browser, no apps needed.

servicesList.title: Virtual Try-On
servicesList.desc: Try before you buy with our Virtual  Try-On services! We use AR to let customers see how products look without having to physically try them.

servicesList.title: AR Marketing
servicesList.desc: Developing interactive AR advertisements to engage customers with memorable brand experiences at events and promotions.

footer.footerContent: Harness the power of smartphones to create immersive, engaging, and impactful augmented reality experiences that elevate your brand.
